validation.active_url: The :attribute field must be a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute field must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha: The :attribute field must only contain letters.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute field must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute field must only contain letters and numbers.
validation.array: The :attribute field must be an array.
validation.ascii: The :attribute field must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
validation.before: The :attribute field must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.between.array: The :attribute field must have between :min and :max items.

validation.confirmed: The :attribute field confirmation does not match.

validation.different: The :attribute field and :other must be different.

validation.image: The :attribute field must be an image.

validation.ipv6: The :attribute field must be a valid IPv6 address.

validation.list: The :attribute field must be a list.
validation.lt.array: The :attribute field must have less than :value items.

validation.lt.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than :value.
validation.lt.string: The :attribute field must be less than :value characters.

validation.lte.file: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value.
validation.lte.string: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value characters.
validation.mac_address: The :attribute field must be a valid MAC address.
validation.max.array: The :attribute field must not have more than :max items.

validation.max.numeric: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max.

validation.mimes: The :attribute field must be a file of type: :values.

validation.min.numeric: The :attribute field must be at least :min.

validation.numeric: The :attribute field must be a number.

validation.password.mixed: The :attribute field must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
validation.password.numbers: The :attribute field must contain at least one number.
validation.password.symbols: The :attribute field must contain at least one symbol.

website_common.footer.title: The ideal facility management system for SMEs
website_common.our_solutions.title: Our solutions
website_common.our_solutions.subtitle: Discover everything SME-Facility can do for you
website_common.our_solutions.inventory.p: A clear and structured view of your technical assets.
website_common.our_solutions.maintenance: Plan, track and analyze your operations.

website_common.our_solutions.qrcode.para: Report and track issues with one scan.

Analyze your data and improve your performance.
website_common.our_solutions.headline: A unique solution, designed for SMEs.
website_common.why_sme.title: Why choose SME-Facility?
website_common.why_sme.subtitle: A solution designed for SMEs
website_common.why_sme.one: Controlled cost: simple and affordable subscription
website_common.why_sme.two: Immediate start: no installation, no complex setup
website_common.why_sme.three: Human support: data import assistance, Facility Management consulting
website_common.why_sme.four: Proximity: developed by an SME, for SMEs
website_common.faq.title: Check out our FAQ, we answer all your questions
website_contact.meta-description: Get in touch with our team to request information, ask questions, or receive personalized assistance.
website_contact.meta-description-og: Get in touch with our team and receive the information or support you need.
website_contact.title: Contact
website_contact.description: Our team is here to answer all your questions. Whether you need information, support, or simply wish to discuss your project, feel free to reach out. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
website_contact.subject: Subject
website_contact.message_placeholder: I am interested in a demo of SME-Facility.
website_contact.thank_you_message: Thank you for your contact request. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
website_contact.mail.contact.title: [:subject] - :company - :name
website_features.assets.meta_description: Centralize your equipment in a clear database linked to your maintenance, contracts and interventions. SME-Facility simplifies the management and tracking of your technical assets.
SME-Facility allows you to inventory, organize and track your equipment in one place. Visualize your technical assets and manage your facilities with simplicity and precision.
website_features.assets.meta_title_og: Keep a clear view of your equipment
website_features.assets.title: Keep a
website_features.assets.subtitle: SME-Facility centralizes all your equipment and facilities in a clear and structured database.
website_features.assets.description: You can easily visualize, organize and track your technical assets while linking each element to its maintenance, contracts, warranties and interventions.
website_features.assets.card-1.title: Technical asset overview
website_features.assets.card-1.descripti: Group all your assets in a single interface: machines, facilities, premises, or critical equipment.
website_features.assets.card-2.title: Link between equipment and operations
website_features.assets.card-2.descripti: Each piece of equipment is connected to its contracts, interventions, maintenance and warranties for complete traceability.
website_features.assets.card-3.title: Simple asset database to maintain
website_features.assets.card-3.descripti: Add, modify or find your equipment in a few clicks, without spreadsheets or scattered files.
website_features.assets.faq.1.question: Structured asset inventory
website_features.assets.faq.1.answer: Create a complete inventory of your equipment and sites. Each element can be described with its main characteristics: type, reference, location, supplier, serial number, installation date or operational status.
website_features.assets.faq.2.question: Automatic linking with other modules
website_features.assets.faq.2.answer: Registered equipment is automatically linked to their contracts, scheduled maintenance, interventions and warranties. This integrated approach allows tracking the entire lifecycle of your assets from a single interface.
website_features.assets.faq.3.question: Advanced search and filters
website_features.assets.faq.3.answer: Quickly find equipment using filters by type, location, supplier or status. This feature facilitates daily management, intervention planning and audit preparation.
website_features.assets.faq.4.question: Complete equipment lifecycle history
website_features.assets.faq.4.answer: Each operation performed (maintenance, intervention, update, status change) is recorded. You have complete traceability, useful for analyzing reliability, forecasting replacements or optimizing budgets.
website_features.assets.faq.5.question: Ease of use and cloud accessibility
website_features.assets.faq.5.answer: The inventory is accessible at all times from the web. No technical installation is required, and information is shared in real time between authorized managers, technicians and providers.
website_features.documents.meta_descript: Centralize all your technical documents, contracts and reports in a single interface. SME-Facility simplifies document management and improves data traceability.
website_features.documents.meta_title_og: All your documents accessible with one click
website_features.documents.meta_descript: SME-Facility centralizes your company's document management: technical sheets, contracts, reports and photos, linked to your equipment and interventions for quick and secure access.
website_features.documents.title: All your documents,
website_features.documents.subtitle: SME-Facility centralizes all documents related to your equipment, contracts and interventions.
website_features.documents.description: No need to search through multiple folders: each file is attached to its asset or operation, instantly accessible by your team.
website_features.documents.card-1.title: Quick access to information
website_features.documents.card-1.descri: Each document is linked to its context (equipment, contract, intervention) for immediate and intuitive search.
website_features.documents.card-2.title: Simplified sharing and collaboration
website_features.documents.card-2.descri: Authorized users can access the files they need, without email exchanges or duplicates.
website_features.documents.card-3.title: Guaranteed archiving and traceability
website_features.documents.card-3.descri: All attachments are preserved and recorded, ensuring perfect document traceability.
website_features.documents.faq.1.answer: Each document (photo, report, quote, certificate, technical sheet, contract, etc.) can be attached directly to an asset, intervention or supplier. You always find the right information in the right place.
website_features.documents.faq.2.questio: Quick access from a single interface
website_features.documents.faq.2.answer: No more scattered files or conflicting versions: SME-Facility brings all documentation together in a single clear interface. Users can access online the documents they need, according to their permissions.
website_features.documents.faq.3.answer: Documents are stored in a secure cloud environment. Authorized members — internal or external — can access them without exchanging attachments, improving productivity and information consistency.
website_features.documents.faq.4.answer: Each file is recorded and linked to a specific context, making it easy to quickly find the version used during an intervention, audit or contract renewal.
website_features.documents.faq.5.answer: Centralization eliminates lost documents, duplicates and unnecessary searches. Teams save time, audits become simple, and document management becomes smoother and more reliable.
website_features.maintenance.meta_descri: Plan your maintenance, receive notifications before deadlines and track your interventions. SME-Facility simplifies preventive and corrective management for SMEs.
website_features.maintenance.meta_title_: Anticipate and plan your maintenance with SME-Facility
website_features.maintenance.meta_descri: SME-Facility allows you to plan maintenance according to frequency, be alerted as deadlines approach and create targeted interventions for each equipment.
website_features.maintenance.title: Structure your maintenance and
website_features.maintenance.subtitle: SME-Facility helps you organize your scheduled maintenance according to the frequency defined for each equipment or location.
website_features.maintenance.description: Managers are automatically notified as a deadline approaches to plan an intervention at the right time.
website_features.maintenance.card-1.desc: Define the maintenance frequency for your equipment and let SME-Facility calculate the next scheduled date, based on the last operation performed.
website_features.maintenance.card-2.desc: The system automatically alerts you when maintenance is due, ensuring schedule compliance and avoiding oversights.
website_features.maintenance.card-3.desc: From planned maintenance or an ad hoc need, easily create an intervention: preventive maintenance, corrective, cleaning, visit or other.
website_features.maintenance.faq.1.answe: When creating or updating an asset or location, indicate the frequency at which maintenance should be performed (monthly, semi-annual, annual, etc.). SME-Facility records this data as a planning basis.
website_features.maintenance.faq.2.answe: The system automatically determines the next maintenance date based on the last recorded date (or the current date if it's the first). This approach gives you a clear view of the overall schedule.
website_features.maintenance.faq.3.answe: Before each deadline, SME-Facility sends an alert to the maintenance manager or facility manager. You can then plan the upcoming maintenance by creating an intervention at the appropriate time.
website_features.maintenance.faq.4.quest: Distinction between planned maintenance and ad hoc intervention
website_features.maintenance.faq.4.answe: Maintenance ensures the continuity and reliability of your equipment, while interventions respond to ad hoc and unforeseen needs. By separating these two approaches, SME-Facility helps you anticipate recurring actions, limit emergencies and optimize your resources for better cost and performance control.
website_features.maintenance.faq.5.answe: Each intervention performed is recorded in the asset history. You have complete traceability of operations, useful for regulatory monitoring, audits or replacement decisions.
website_features.contracts.meta_descript: Centralize your contracts, track your suppliers and receive alerts before deadlines. SME-Facility simplifies the management of commitments and warranties for your equipment.
Manage your maintenance contracts and warranties with ease. SME-Facility alerts you before each deadline to better manage your suppliers and technical assets.
website_features.contracts.title: Anticipate your deadlines and
website_features.contracts.subtitle: SME-Facility centralizes the management of your contracts and warranties.
website_features.contracts.description: You track your commitments, suppliers and deadlines from a single interface, while receiving automatic alerts before renewals or warranty expirations.
website_features.contracts.card-1.title: Centralized contracts
website_features.contracts.card-1.descri: Easily manage all your contracts, assign them to equipment or locations, and link them to your suppliers for global and structured tracking.
website_features.contracts.card-2.title: Notifications before deadline
website_features.contracts.card-2.descri: Automatically receive an email before the end of a contract or warranty to renew, extend or terminate on time.
website_features.contracts.card-3.title: Clear status tracking
website_features.contracts.card-3.descri: Identify at a glance active, expired or cancelled contracts, and maintain a clear view of your current commitments.
website_features.contracts.faq.1.answer: Create contracts with their type (maintenance, rental, insurance, service, etc.), their associated supplier, duration and notice period. You can specify whether renewal is manual or automatic to avoid any unpleasant surprises at the deadline.
website_features.contracts.faq.2.questio: Direct association with assets or locations
website_features.contracts.faq.2.answer: Each contract can be attached to one or more equipment or locations, providing complete traceability between your facilities, providers and contractual commitments.
website_features.contracts.faq.3.answer: Before the end of a contract or warranty, SME-Facility sends an email alert to the relevant manager. You thus have the necessary time to anticipate renewals, renegotiate terms or organize termination within deadlines.
website_features.contracts.faq.4.answer: Each contract has a status (current, expired, cancelled) automatically updated according to the deadline. This visibility allows you to control costs, avoid involuntary renewals and maintain control over your suppliers.
website_features.contracts.faq.5.answer: For each equipment, you can indicate if a warranty is active, its duration and end date. SME-Facility automatically notifies you as it approaches expiration, allowing you to act quickly before coverage ends.
website_features.qrcode.meta_description: Allow anyone to report a problem with one scan. SME-Facility simplifies ticket creation through QR codes placed on your equipment and locations.
website_features.qrcode.meta_title_og: Report an incident with one scan using SME-Facility
website_features.qrcode.meta_description: SME-Facility QR codes allow any user to create a ticket instantly. The manager receives the request and plans the intervention with one click.
website_features.qrcode.title: Report a problem with
website_features.qrcode.subtitle: SME-Facility QR codes allow any user — employee, occupant or visitor — to report an incident instantly.
website_features.qrcode.description: A simple scan opens a ticketing form: description, photo, validation. The maintenance manager immediately receives the notification and can plan the intervention.
website_features.qrcode.card-1.title: Ultra-fast reporting
website_features.qrcode.card-1.descripti: A QR code on each equipment or location allows creating a ticket in seconds, without login or app installation.
website_features.qrcode.card-2.title: Direct and efficient communication
website_features.qrcode.card-2.descripti: As soon as a ticket is submitted, the manager receives an email with all necessary information to plan an intervention.
website_features.qrcode.card-3.title: Incident traceability
website_features.qrcode.card-3.descripti: All tickets are linked to the relevant asset, ensuring a clear view of problem history and actions taken.
website_features.qrcode.faq.1.question: Simple and universal scan
website_features.qrcode.faq.1.answer: Each QR code is associated with a specific equipment or location. Simply scan it with a smartphone to open a clear and intuitive web form: problem description, optional photo and immediate submission.
website_features.qrcode.faq.2.question: No installation required
website_features.qrcode.faq.2.answer: The system is designed to be accessible to everyone — even without a user account. Perfect for internal employees, visitors, or providers who need to report an occasional malfunction.
website_features.qrcode.faq.3.question: Automatic notification to the manager
website_features.qrcode.faq.3.answer: As soon as a ticket is created, the maintenance manager or facility manager receives an email detailing the request: description, photo, location, original QR code. They can then assign the task to an internal technician or external provider.
website_features.qrcode.faq.4.question: Ticket centralization and tracking
website_features.qrcode.faq.4.answer: Each ticket is automatically attached to the corresponding asset or location. From the application, the manager can view the complete history: past incidents, interventions performed, processing times.
website_features.qrcode.faq.5.question: Time savings and better responsiveness
website_features.qrcode.faq.5.answer: By eliminating informal exchanges (emails, calls, messages), the QR code simplifies information reporting from the field. Problems are reported faster, interventions better planned and resolution times reduced.
website_features.roles.meta_description: Simple and secure access. SME-Facility defines clear roles for SMEs: Facility Manager and Maintenance Manager, each with appropriate rights.
website_features.roles.meta_description_: With SME-Facility, roles are simple and precise. The Facility Manager supervises everything, the Maintenance Manager manages their equipment. Clarity, security and efficiency guaranteed.
website_features.roles.title: Clear access for
website_features.roles.subtitle: SME-Facility defines simple and precise roles to ensure smooth and secure use.
website_features.roles.description: Each user accesses only the data and equipment that concerns them, without risk of error or confusion.
website_features.roles.card-1.title: Clear structure without complexity
website_features.roles.card-1.descriptio: Two distinct roles, designed for SMEs: Facility Manager and Maintenance Manager, each with rights adapted to their responsibilities.
website_features.roles.card-2.title: Secure and controlled access
website_features.roles.card-2.descriptio: Each user acts only on the data they manage, ensuring consistency and reliability of shared information.
website_features.roles.card-3.title: Visibility adapted to each profile
website_features.roles.card-3.descriptio: Facility Managers maintain a global view while Maintenance Managers focus on their own equipment.
website_features.roles.faq.1.question: Facility Manager: complete supervision
website_features.roles.faq.1.answer: The Facility Manager has complete access to the application: asset creation, location configuration, contract management and global maintenance tracking. They supervise the entire technical park and operations.
website_features.roles.faq.2.question: Maintenance Manager: targeted management
website_features.roles.faq.2.answer: This profile accesses only the assets they are responsible for. They can update information and track interventions without interfering with other management areas, ensuring simple and controlled use.
website_features.roles.faq.3.question: A model designed for SMEs
website_features.roles.faq.3.answer: The role separation in SME-Facility avoids the complexity of multi-permission systems. You benefit from a clear, easy-to-administer tool perfectly suited to human-sized structures.
website_features.statistics.meta_descrip: Manage your interventions and track your maintenance KPIs. SME-Facility offers a visual dashboard to analyze performance and improve equipment management.
website_features.statistics.meta_title_o: Analyze and manage your maintenance performance
website_features.statistics.meta_descrip: With SME-Facility, track your statistics in real time: interventions performed, delays, average times and maintenance distribution. Make informed decisions to optimize your operations.
website_features.statistics.title: Analyze, manage and
website_features.statistics.subtitle: Thanks to its integrated dashboard, SME-Facility provides a clear and quantified view of your activity.
website_features.statistics.description: Track your interventions, detect delays, measure average processing times and manage your maintenance performance.
website_features.statistics.card-1.title: Real-time key indicators
website_features.statistics.card-1.descr: Visualize the evolution of your interventions and maintenance through clear and updated KPIs.
website_features.statistics.card-2.title: Simplified management for managers
website_features.statistics.card-2.descr: Statistics are accessible to administrators and Facility Managers for overall activity tracking.
website_features.statistics.card-3.title: Continuous improvement and informed decisions
website_features.statistics.card-3.descr: Identify bottlenecks, optimize your resources and improve your intervention times.
website_features.statistics.faq.1.answer: SME-Facility provides a dynamic dashboard presenting your main indicators: total number of interventions, overdue maintenance, average resolution time and distribution of intervention types. Charts facilitate reading and comparison over time.
website_features.statistics.faq.2.answer: Managers can measure team responsiveness and workload, evaluate providers and identify areas requiring special attention. This data promotes proactive management and better resource balance.
website_features.statistics.faq.3.answer: Overdue maintenance and unclosed interventions appear clearly in the dashboard. You can thus act immediately to correct delays and maintain service quality.
website_features.statistics.faq.4.answer: By centralizing key indicators, SME-Facility helps administrators and Facility Managers track trends and guide their decisions: planning, investments, intervention prioritization or strengthening maintenance contracts.
website_features.statistics.faq.5.answer: Statistics provide a lever for improvement: they allow analyzing process efficiency, adjusting maintenance frequencies and demonstrating service value to management.
website_home.title: Facility Management Solution for SMEs
website_home.description: Simplify your facility management with SME-Facility. An all-in-one cloud solution to centralize your equipment, maintenance, contracts and interventions.
website_home.title_og: The ideal Facility Management system for SMEs
website_home.description_og: SME-Facility centralizes the management of your equipment, maintenance and contracts in a simple and complete web application. Save time and optimize your operations.
website_home.hero_subtitle: Centralize your equipment, simplify your maintenance and optimize your facilities
website_home.hero_description: SME-Facility centralizes the management of your equipment, maintenance and contracts. An all-in-one tool that simplifies your daily operations, reduces your costs and strengthens collaboration within your company.
website_home.section-1.title: Save time and simplify your management
website_home.section-1.subtitle: One platform for all your facilities
website_home.section-1.card-1.title: Time saving
website_home.section-1.card-1.paragraph: Manage all your equipment information in a single tool and keep a complete record of interventions.
website_home.section-1.card-2.title: Maintenance management
website_home.section-1.card-2.paragraph: Plan your preventive and corrective maintenance, track your interventions and receive reminders before deadlines.

website_who.facility_manager.meta_title: Facility Management Tool for Facility Managers
website_who.facility_manager.meta_descri: Centralize your facilities, plan your maintenance and track your KPIs with SME-Facility, the complete platform for demanding Facility Managers.
website_who.facility_manager.meta_title_: Manage your facilities with precision using SME-Facility
website_who.facility_manager.meta_descri: With SME-Facility, Facility Managers have a complete tool to manage their technical assets, automate preventive maintenance and measure operational performance.
website_who.facility_manager.title: with precision and optimize your maintenance operations.
website_who.facility_manager.subtitle: SME-Facility offers Facility Managers a complete platform for facility management and equipment lifecycle.
website_who.facility_manager.description: By centralizing technical data, interventions and providers, you control costs, secure operations and improve site performance.
website_who.facility_manager.section.1.d: No more scattered files and lost information: SME-Facility gathers all your equipment, contracts and interventions in one secure space. You have a complete digital inventory, accessible anywhere, to track your technical assets in real time.
website_who.facility_manager.section.2.d: Never miss a service, contract or regulatory check again. The system sends automatic alerts for all important deadlines. You anticipate interventions and avoid unexpected shutdowns, while reducing administrative burden.
website_who.facility_manager.section.3.d: With the ticketing portal, your technicians, subcontractors or partners can communicate directly on each request. Email notifications keep all parties informed, for smooth and transparent tracking.
website_who.facility_manager.section.4.d: SME-Facility is 100% cloud: no installation, no technical configuration. In minutes, you define your company preferences and start managing your equipment. An intuitive interface guarantees quick adoption and immediate productivity gains.

website_who.maintenance_manager.meta_des: Supervise your interventions, technicians and equipment from one interface. SME-Facility simplifies daily maintenance.
website_who.maintenance_manager.meta_tit: Stay in control of your maintenance operations with SME-Facility
website_who.maintenance_manager.meta_des: Plan, track and analyze your interventions wherever you are. SME-Facility offers maintenance managers smooth, mobile and efficient operations management.
website_who.maintenance_manager.title-sp: Stay in control of your interventions and teams
website_who.maintenance_manager.title: , wherever you are.
website_who.maintenance_manager.subtitle: SME-Facility supports maintenance managers in daily management of interventions, teams and equipment.
website_who.maintenance_manager.descript: In the field or at the office, you have a mobile, simple and efficient tool to organize, track and optimize your maintenance operations.
A global and centralized view of technical assets

Access all your assets in real time: critical equipment, contracts, sites, providers and interventions. SME-Facility provides a clear map of your technical heritage, facilitating action prioritization and strategic decision-making. Detailed maintenance and intervention history ensures complete traceability.

Automate your preventive maintenance plans and generate reminders for each deadline. You can track intervention progress in real time, assess team workload and analyze provider performance. Digital work orders standardize processes and improve reporting quality.

SME-Facility integrates contextualized document management: technical manuals, photos, reports, certificates or contractual documents are accessible from each equipment. Thanks to QR codes and mobile access, your technicians always have the right information, reducing error risks and facilitating audits.

Integrated dashboards and KPIs allow evaluation of equipment availability, intervention responsiveness and SLA compliance. SME-Facility becomes a true decision support tool, focused on operational performance and cost control.
website_why.meta_description: Discover why SME-Facility is the ideal partner for SMEs. An affordable, simple and complete cloud solution to centralize your equipment, maintenance and contracts.
website_why.meta_description_og: A solution designed by an SME for SMEs: data centralization, ease of use, personalized support and controlled cost. SME-Facility simplifies facility management.
website_why.title: SME-Facility is your ideal partner
website_why.subtitle: Designed for SMEs, SME-Facility brings together all essential Facility Management features in a simple, accessible and efficient solution.
website_why.description: A complete platform, without unnecessary complexity, to control your costs and gain efficiency.
website_why.section.1.title: All good reasons to choose SME-Facility
website_why.section.1.card.1.title: Centralization: everything in one place
website_why.section.1.card.1.items: All your data — equipment, maintenance, contracts, warranties — gathered in one platform.
A unified view of your technical assets and operations.
Less time wasted searching for information, more daily efficiency.
A structured database, ready for internal and external collaboration.
website_why.section.1.card.2.title: Ease of use: simple, intuitive and fast
website_why.section.1.card.2.items: An ergonomic interface designed for SMEs, no complex training required.
Excel import and export to quickly integrate your existing data or extract reports.
Quick start: minimal setup, no external intervention.
A smooth web application, accessible anywhere and on any device.
website_why.section.1.card.3.title: Cost: an efficient and affordable solution
website_why.section.1.card.3.items: A clear subscription, with no hidden fees or technical installation see pricing
Immediate project cost reduction through quick commissioning and no IT maintenance.
A 100% cloud solution, no server or infrastructure to manage.
Measurable return on investment from the first months of use.
website_why.section.1.card.4.title: Support: real field assistance
website_why.section.1.card.4.items: Our team supports you in setting up your maintenance program.
We advise you in defining your critical assets and FM strategies.
Personalized follow-up to ensure your deployment success.
Concrete help with data import and initial setup.
website_why.section.1.card.5.title: An SME for SMEs: proximity and understanding
website_why.section.1.card.5.items: SME-Facility is developed by an SME, for SMEs: proximity, responsiveness and listening.
We understand your constraints, priorities and field reality.
A human approach, far from large groups and impersonal software.
Direct exchanges with the team that designs and improves the solution.
